channel.title: Putting server on
channel.description: Im doing 718 server,I did portforwarding and put my ip in the client do i now just upload the client so others play or no-ip is neccesary and whats it for?For hosting server to be always online?And at runelocus it shows different then in cmd ???It says its already in use..wtf?

item.title: Putting server on
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

^ Useless advice…

  1. Check if your No-ip is on.
  2. Check if you have changed the correct IP’s in your client/AND server
  3. Check if you have portforwarded, Not accurate but here: www.canyouseeme.org
    [center]Still Doesn’t Work?[/center]
    Do all of the things i said above if it still doesn’t work

Read full topic
